quotes.quote: I've never really had any barrier to break I guess. I don't really have anything to rebel against. I'm quite lucky.
I never felt like I had to rebel against my convent upbringing, because it was comparatively regular.
I'm not going to be a rebel and offend anybody, but I'm not going to live in somebody else's image.
Rebels are the people who refuse the seen for the unseen.
You don't have to burn books, you don't have to rebel against teachers to rebel; to rebel is to truly own your own self.
Rebels and non-conformists are often the pioneers and designers of change.
It's not rebels that make trouble, but trouble that makes rebels.
Everyone has that moment where they just rebel.
Every organization should tolerate rebels who tell the emperor he has no clothes.
Today's rebel is tomorrow's tyrant.
Rebels seldom make good revolutionaries, because organized action, even union with other people, is not possible for them.
The rebel can never find peace. He knows what is good and, despite himself, does evil. The value which supports him is never given to him once and for all.
The despairing soul is a rebel.
The rebels did more in one night than my whole army would have done in one month.
If you want to rebel, rebel from inside the system.That's much more powerful than rebelling outside the system.
Every man who has shown the world the way to beauty, to true culture, has been a rebel, a 'universal' without patriotism, without home, who has found his people everywhere.
The worst of rebels never arm To do their king or country harm, But draw their swords to do them good, As doctors cure by letting blood.
Since it's now fashionable to laugh at the conservative French Academy, I have remained a rebel by joining it.
Fallen man is not simply an imperfect creature who needs improvement: he is a rebel who must lay down his arms.
The rebel in me never really had died. She just needed some time off and a reason to come back to work.
When I need to identify rebels, I look for men with principles.
You can't be a rebel without the scars that come with it. Truth is, some days scars are just as ugly as they are beautiful.
In order to exist, man must rebel.
Never rebel for the sake of rebelling, but always rebel for the sake of truth.
What hurts me most is poverty, and that's what led me to become a rebel.
I was always a rebel in the sense that I always wanted to go my own road and do something that nobody else has done.
I'll rebel against powers and principalities, all the time. Always, I will.
Every woman is a rebel, and usually in wild revolt against herself.
The difference between a rebel and a patriot depends upon who is in power at the moment.
If You Want To Rebel Against Society, Don't Dull The Blade.
